Class MainView

Object
MainView
public class MainView extends Object
Main View class for the CLI interface. VIEW LAYER: Responsible ONLY for displaying information and getting user input. - Shows main menu - Gets login/registration input - Formats output DOES NOT contain business logic or routing decisions.
